html:
Time is running out
Hourglasses pour sand
Day after day
There is less of it
We get rid of the weeds
Collect the crops
While the hawks hunt
And the mice hide
The Sun burns a lot
So little shade to cover
Every blow of zephyr
Is a little blessing
And one afternoon
Right when the bell rings
The last visitor comes
And takes us away
title: Zephyr
